questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子中有兩個錯誤：1. 'visit' 應該改為過去式 'visited'，因為有時間副詞 'Last week'；2. 動詞 'visit' 後通常直接接地點，不需要介系詞 'to'。正確的句子應該是 'Last week, they visited the museum.'
questionData.instruction: Identify the error(s) in the sentence above and rewrite it correctly.
questionData.original_sentence: Last week, they visit to the museum.
standard_corrections: Last week, they visited the museum.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子中主詞是 'One' (單數)，因此動詞應該用單數形式 'is'，而不是複數形式 'are'。正確的句子應該是 'One of the students is missing their book.' (註：代名詞 'their' 在這裡指單數的學生，在現代英語中是可接受的用法)。
questionData.instruction: Identify the error(s) in the sentence above and rewrite it correctly.
questionData.original_sentence: One of the students are missing their book.
standard_corrections: One of the students is missing their book.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子中修飾動詞 'speaks' 應該用副詞，而不是形容詞。'goodly' 是一個較少用的形容詞，這裡應該使用 'good' 的副詞形式 'well'。正確的句子應該是 'He speaks English very well.'
questionData.instruction: Identify the error(s) in the sentence above and rewrite it correctly.
